item.description:
One of our members has graciously offered her residence for a meetup close to Boston.

Ho'Oponopono (Hawaiian process of forgiveness and clearing) is such an intimate process, it is wonderful to be able to offer it in such an intimate setting. (as opposed to the libraries )

Even if you have learned or experienced this before, you may find new insights from me or other attending.  It is also powerful do with others.

On this evening we will -

  • discover what Ho'oponopono is and what it really means
  • learn some basics of Huna
  • learn a bit about the history of ho'oponopono
    • Morna Simeone
    • Dr. Hew Len
  • experience a beautiful forgiveness mediitation

Forgiveness is becoming seen as a vital part of emotional health.  It is also a way of clearing yourself of thoughts and feelings that get in the way of getting or attracting what you want - Law of Attraction

Please join us for this wonderful evening.
item.how_to_find_us: There are two porches....It is the back porch with the plants. There will be a light on for you.

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: Healing and Clearing through Ho'Oponopono
